<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a3825368aca2bc1550d173660df4da6a6">getSubtarget</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aarch64subtarget">AArch64Subtarget</a>&gt;().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aarch64subtarget/#aa2bf24e995494a7c64d8f3e02818ad30">ClassifyGlobalReference</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">          GV, MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#af777ff93c9e07a6ff5ffe3226deb3e76">getTarget</a>()) != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64ii/#ae22a65863fdb02ce99abf9ee08bcbb71a48b42f4ac550b5ae203477aad0eb5e75">AArch64II::MO&#95;NO&#95;FLAG</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look for a G&#95;GLOBAL&#95;VALUE only used by G&#95;PTR&#95;ADDs against constants:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %g = G&#95;GLOBAL&#95;VALUE @x</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %ptr1 = G&#95;PTR&#95;ADD %g, cst1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %ptr2 = G&#95;PTR&#95;ADD %g, cst2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %ptrN = G&#95;PTR&#95;ADD %g, cstN</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Identify the &#42;smallest&#42; constant. We want to be able to form this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %offset&#95;g = G&#95;GLOBAL&#95;VALUE @x + min&#95;cst</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %g = G&#95;PTR&#95;ADD %offset&#95;g, -min&#95;cst</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %ptr1 = G&#95;PTR&#95;ADD %g, cst1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Dst = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t MinOffset = -1ull;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;UseInstr : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.use&#95;nodbg&#95;instructions(Dst)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UseInstr.getOpcode() != TargetOpcode::G&#95;PTR&#95;ADD)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Cst = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac76eb82370e997f967454f441effbbff">getIConstantVRegValWithLookThrough</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">        UseInstr.getOperand(2).getReg(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Cst)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MinOffset = std::min(MinOffset, Cst-&gt;Value.getZExtValue());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Require that the new offset is larger than the existing one to avoid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// infinite loops.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t CurrOffset = GlobalOp.getOffset();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t NewOffset = MinOffset + CurrOffset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NewOffset &lt;= CurrOffset)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check whether folding this offset is legal. It must not go out of bounds of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the referenced object to avoid violating the code model, and must be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// smaller than 2^20 because this is the largest offset expressible in all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// object formats. (The IMAGE&#95;REL&#95;ARM64&#95;PAGEBASE&#95;REL21 relocation in COFF</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stores an immediate signed 21 bit offset.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This check also prevents us from folding negative offsets, which will end</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// up being treated in the same way as large positive ones. They could also</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cause code model violations, and aren&#39;t really common enough to matter.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NewOffset &gt;= (1 &lt;&lt; 20))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;T = GV-&gt;getValueType();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!T-&gt;isSized() ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewOffset &gt; GV-&gt;getDataLayout().getTypeAllocSize(T))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MatchInfo = std::make&#95;pair(NewOffset, MinOffset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> AddReg =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.buildInstr(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode(), &#123;MidTy&#125;, &#123;Ext1Reg, Ext2Reg&#125;).getReg(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// G&#95;SUB has to sign-extend the result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// G&#95;ADD needs to sext from sext and can sext or zext from zext, so the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// original opcode is used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode() == TargetOpcode::G&#95;ADD)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.buildInstr(Opc, &#123;DstReg&#125;, &#123;AddReg&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.buildSExt(DstReg, AddReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.eraseFromParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-aarch64prelegalizercombiner-cpp-/#af6dea6ab7fff2717e5813f576518e4f2"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-aarch64prelegalizercombiner-cpp-/#af6dea6ab7fff2717e5813f576518e4f2">tryToSimplifyUADDO</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/combinerhelper">CombinerHelper</a> &amp;Helper,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/giselchangeobserver">GISelChangeObserver</a> &amp;Observer) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try simplify G&#95;UADDO with 8 or 16 bit operands to wide G&#95;ADD and TBNZ if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// result is only used in the no-overflow case. It is restricted to cases</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where we know that the high-bits of the operands are 0 If there&#39;s an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// overflow, then the 9th or 17th bit must be set, which can be checked</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// using TBNZ.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Change (for UADDOs on 8 and 16 bits):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %z0 = G&#95;ASSERT&#95;ZEXT &#95;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %op0 = G&#95;TRUNC %z0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %z1 = G&#95;ASSERT&#95;ZEXT &#95;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %op1 = G&#95;TRUNC %z1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %val, %cond = G&#95;UADDO %op0, %op1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   G&#95;BRCOND %cond, %error.bb</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// error.bb:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (no successors and no uses of %val)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %z0 = G&#95;ASSERT&#95;ZEXT &#95;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %z1 = G&#95;ASSERT&#95;ZEXT &#95;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %add = G&#95;ADD %z0, %z1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %val = G&#95;TRUNC %add</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %bit = G&#95;AND %add, 1 &lt;&lt; scalar-size-in-bits(%op1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %cond = G&#95;ICMP NE, %bit, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   G&#95;BRCOND %cond, %error.bb</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"></CodeLine>
